msg: Specify clearly different URIs for the domain controller and the nodes to make it easier to understand what's going (instead of using very close port numbers for the various parts of the domain).

msg: Specify usable URIs for the different nodes in the distributed calculator. Specify WSDL port in simplecallback sample composite as it was not specifying it and was assuming that the default port was 8085.
